message.body: I have a question, all knowing cici
As someone who has seen more success than I I need your advice
Hit me

This really tacky gallery wants to put me on their site, do I say yes in hope of sales or do I do nothing? I really won't be focusing on my "art" work until grad school so if someone else will sell it for me that's good right?
But on the other hand the guy is a sleaze ball with no taste not class and its apparent from his website
Sorry for typos walking to Starbucks
Send the website. Depends what you want your brand to be
Hmmm. This may be one of those "no " moments.
I think it's a no. But find a better gallery?
Or do it for the exposure
I was thinking about the exposure. Maybe ill do it for a 3 months, if nothing sells. Ill ask to be taken off.
Yes
That is sensible. What %do they take?
Waiting to hear.
Thanks. FYI.
In 2013, ambition is my middle name.
Hee her
Me too. I'm worried my love life is too distracting
Wats the scoop?
Kinda
Are u considering settling down?

I've been in this tempestuous thing w mac and I love him but in the period of feeling betrayed/tempestuous-ness I sort of disinvested and now the idea of having a Boyfriend feels really weird: while he's all the more invested in me
And I'm not sure whether to take a break, to try to make it work, or to say I wanna be open
Sounds like its time to do nothing and disappear for a weekend.
No decision is sometimes the only decision.
Exactly! I'm in the train to CT right now!
God bless you for saying that
I literally was just thinking that
Like, I should put my energy into what I do know for sure
Oh you know it already. That sounds nice. Wish I wasn't taking a summer class. I'd come and bother u.
Yes!!!!
